author: JB Acosta
comment: App messed up and there was a transfer issue. Now I have a $24 overdraft charge. Called "money services", excuse me "member sevices" and explained my issue, not a care in the world. If you use this app double check every transaction and fee. Or just go to a different Credit Union/Bank.

author: Dawn Thompson
comment: Keeps locking up. When it works it's great

author: Larissa Cameron
comment: I like the app but the bill pay is not working. I keep getting an error when entering the amount to pay and can't get past the screen to complete the payment information.

author: Jay Alaniz
comment: This app wasn't showing the correct amount of money available so needless to say that charges were not showing up on hold . So that cost me over 150.00 on overdrafts fees . I never have had a overdraft with any of my banks . So they really need to get things fixed on this application. Cause it Only hurts the customers who depend on the the app to show all debit charges to be showing up .

author: Jeff Cotton
comment: App keeps asking me to verify my phone number EVERY TIME open it up. This is getting really old really fast!

author: Jenn Armijo
comment: I would have known about a fraud faster if the widget would update better

author: Todd Gentry
comment: I loved the widget but it has been removed from the Galaxy S7.. please bring back!!

author: Brittany Knapp
comment: I can see my account balance and apply for loans but nothing else loads

author: Irene Gaylord
comment: Great customer service and very up to date with technology. Also tellers are very helpful. Pretty happy

author: Ohlahtunjih Muhammed
comment: Goody

author: Scott Craigie
comment: Thx

author: Curtis Romero
comment: It's great

author: Amanda Patella
comment: (Samsung galaxy S6 edge) I've been using this app for a couple years now and figured I might as well write a review. I've never had an issue with this app and I especially love that you can use fingerprint recognition for logging in now. I've never had an issue with mobile deposits either, which I know other (even major/national/big) banks have issues with in their apps. Great work rbfcu! We moved away from San Antonio over a year ago and still stay with you guys because we can do everything from here!
title: Great

author: Kairra Collins
comment: Old version was awesome! If it showed a trans as pending the amount was already taken from the balance making your running balance accurate so you didn't go negative. This new app shows its pending but doesn't pull the funds to put them on hold so you can't spend what you have already spent. With this new update you could very well spend what has already been spent and go negative!
title: Inaccurate balance

author: Kevin Kelly
comment: This new update sucks!  I shouldn't have to go to a computer to transfer funds!  I also don't like the idea that my password isn't saved on my phone.   My phone is password protected.   That's all I  need.  Why is this harder than it should be?  Is anyone reading these reviews?
title: No transfer capability and no password save

author: JORDAN BECKER
comment: Still no running balance totals on this new update. Some pending transactions count against your balance, and some don't. It gets a little confusing sometimes. This update is the same functionally, with a prettier face.
title: Running Balance Totals? Maybe One Day?

author: Acton Paff
comment: This app is horrible! It won't let me log in... I've entered the proper information countless times! I made sure to double check my login credentials to make sure I'm not entering the wrong info and it keeps saying my login info is wrong. New user login doesn't work

author: Carlos E. Pecina Sr.
comment: Had a problem opening app at first, Uninstalled and re-installed... no problem.                                                After you login, all account info is just 1 click away. So much Better! Great job RBFCU
title: New update... loving it

author: Dion Minoria
comment: This app is garbage. Use to be able to do E-deposits. Now with all the updates the camera feature is not recognizing checks. With the limited banks around it's truly a painful experience having to plan a 20min trip to the bank to deposit checks.

author: Jake Luna
comment: As a new customer, using mobile apps in 2016 is almost commonplace, and pretty much part of what goes into selecting a financial institution. It is extremely difficult to make mobile check deposits, after trying a dozen times, with different backgrounds, methods, and trials, nothing worked and it kept erroring out. Fix the mobile deposit standards, and the rating will increase. A bit off putting for a new customer to have to deal with a subpar app.

author: Julian Gary Lopez
comment: This app sucks!!! The old version was better!!! The old one..... My device would remember the password, touch the icon, & I'm in, like Flinn. This me one ask me for my password every friggin time. At least when I was with BOA, they're app was one easy step to log in. Good grief!!!

author: Nena Rodriguez
comment: The widget used to update quickly whenever I asked it to.  I switched to a Samsung S8 and now it goes into a loop when refreshing your balance. I have to log in to see what it is.  I've tried different settings to refresh at different intervals and it does the same thing.

author: Laura Tennant
comment: The fingerprint login is nice but seeing my data is more important. I need to be able to see my credit card purchases. This crucial function has disappeared.
title: Where did my CC statement go?

author: Kenneth Resendez
comment: Mediocre app, manupaltive banking system. This app does not give an accurate representing of pending balance versus if you logged into the web page.  If you had checks pending, you would not see it on the app.  Also, I had one transaction appear one day and disappear  the next.  I took a photo of this with another phone since they drm rights on screen  shots.  Watch out for this bank... sneaky, sneaky.

author: Bubba Beandip
comment: Since update this is very hard to use... it does not choose the next date available when paying bills. Meaning if you don't pay bills 2 week in advance you have to keep choosing days until you get one that works... does anyone on the development team actually use the app? The poor functionality should have b caught in the test phase.
title: Used to be good

author: Tracey Walker
comment: Despite uninstalling and reinstalling several times the app will not allow me to login.  A message appears stating that it has stopped working.  I use an android platform.  Any help would be appreciated.   Thanks
title: Crashes

author: Kelseypp Jones
comment: Does not show your accurate available balance. Account stated I had a balance of $544 and an available balance of $304. So I proceeded to pay a bill that was due the next day. Come to find out that was not the true available balance and my account went in to the negative and because I did not notice that same day, I was charged a fee.

author: Lainey O
comment: I've had this app since it first came out and have never had issues with any version. This update is garbage. Somehow you've managed to turn a great and useful UI into something unnecessarily cumbersome and inefficient. Uninstalling. Would rather use Web app and tellers instead.
title: Horrible update. Ridiculous to navigate.

author: Matthew McCain
comment: I have trouble doing simple things like logging in. Says "Not logged in", yet won't bring up the login screen when you click 'Login" button. Press 'check balances' and it just turns the button a different color. Have to close and reopen several times before, or if, it finally let's me see my balances. Go back to the old app...this one's awful.
title: Buggy and unresponsive

author: Anthony Garza
comment: I used to enjoy having the bank app on my phone however the last 2 months,i haven't been able to make an E-deposit. I just found out you have to have a certain credit score to access this online banking feature. So, now, i have to take time out of my day to go to a bank to deposit funds. I work 3 jobs. If i had time to visit a bank, i wouldn't have gotten the bank app on my phone.

author: Jeremi Sadler
comment: Crashes every time I log in. I've tried reinstalling the app with no luck. Never had a problem before this update. Unusable.

author: Chelsea Bennett
comment: The echeck deposit is a joke. I tried to get my check in focus, NEVER worked. It was either the lighting, the background, the size, the dimensions....useless. Tried and gave up. Lame.

author: QueensAmbition Covarrubias
comment: Worst update ever. Does not let you see payments made to loc or anything its ridiculous.
title: Horrible

author: Kellie R
comment: Dont update if you still have transfer capabilities!!! The new update has no option to transfer. All you can do is check balances and make deposits. I don't understand why they would make the app pretty much worthless like that. Done by people who have no clue what customers need I'm sure.
title: Don't update if you can still transfer

author: Cody R. Seebohm
comment: The GUI changes are not very intuitive. E-Deposits are easier, but having it default to an account rather than confirm the deposit account makes for easy mistakes. Also, the funds transfer (which I had to do after E-Depositing to the wrong account) was not easy to find. A $ button does not mean much to me.
title: Not Intuitive

author: JJ Gragas
comment: App always gives me connection errors. I always have to access my account on my desktop.

author: Margarita Villaronga
comment: Ever since the last update it is quick loading accounts. It is slow showing credit card transactions. Not sure if its the cc providers. Hope this can be updated.

author: Steven T
comment: Seriously considering closing my account now.

reply.author: Vertifi Software
reply.content: Please uninstall and re-install the app, this should get you going again

title: Crashes every time I try to open it

author: Branden
comment: The developer or development team who designed and coded this apk is awful. Time to switch to USAA.

author: Hard Core
comment: The app is good the bank is just a bunch of crooks .just robbed me for $72 !! 3 courtesy pays I did not need,because my account was negative for two minutes literally two minutes while I transfered money from my savings to my checking. Bankers ha crooks!!!!!
